column4: Let me clarify my issue.... If I drop to terminal My resolution is not correct without X.  Is there somewhere to fix that?
I think you need to specify some "vga=" setting in your kernel parameters in grub or lilo
gparted is a non-descructive partitioning tool?
.... you can do nondestructive resizing of drives ( in theory) .....
oh, I see what you mean.  ok.  does it work?
is freenx packaged for ubuntu?  is it in the repos?
I see.  It's not available in the official repositories
my mother always told me not to take binaries from strange men
sorry .My wife is in labor.  My humor is not there right now
were you planning to use freenx to watch the birth remotely?  how long do we have to get it working?

Just to mangage things here and upload (which I can do with ssh) to the ftp the video.  I was going to do the editing remotly.  She has been having contractions for 2 days so far.... still 2 Hours apart.
did you try VNC instead?  It may not be so smooth, but it's probably easier to get working.
